description:
Overview: This course will help students to understand how they can use excel functions to analyze and extract information from a large data. We will practice the exercises on real data which will make the insights meaningful and practical.

Target audience: This course is most helpful for students who have graduated / analysts in a consulting company or financial services sector. As an analyst, the day to day work involves working extensively on data analysis to identify trends. This course helps such professionals to get a basic understanding how excel can help.

Materials: There is an excel exercise that we do in this course. For best learning, please download the video and do the exercise simultaneously. If possible, have external speakers connected and see the video on a large screen to simulate the class experience.

Duration: The course is about 45 mins video but might take 2-3 hours if you practice the exercise simultaneously. Feel free to practice one function at a time before moving to the next one.
title: Basic excel functions to analyze large data
